definition: thorn/sting/thrust/to prick/to pierce/to stab/to assassinate/to murder
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

pinyin: fei4 ci4 ji1 xing4 du2 ji4

sentences.english: Behind any great innovation, there's an irritant.
sentences.chinese: 在所有偉大的創新背後都有某個刺激性的東西。

sentences.english: Secondly, mineral makeup is all natural and hypo-allergenic.
sentences.chinese: 其次，礦物化妝品是純天然和無刺激性的。
“你在增強刺激性，”西曼斯基說。

sentences.english: Game of this kind of bloodcurdling, let players feel a kind of excitant pleasant sensation instead.
sentences.chinese: 這種恐怖的遊戲，反而讓玩家們感到一種刺激性快感。

sentences.english: The results of mouse bone marrow micronucleus test was negative. It was not irritative to skin.
sentences.chinese: 小鼠骨髓微核試驗結果爲陰性，對皮膚無刺激性。

sentences.english: Finally, the toxicity and pharmacodynamics were carried out on the Rotundine nasal spray.
sentences.chinese: 進行了羅通定鼻腔噴霧劑的刺激性和藥效學研究。

sentences.english: Fragrance-free, preservative-free, non-irritating, and ideal for sensitive skin.
sentences.chinese: 無香料，無防腐劑，無刺激性，非常適合敏感皮膚。

sentences.english: For skin like yours, you need to avoid harsh cleansers.
sentences.chinese: 對於你這種膚質，你應該避免刺激性洗面奶。

sentences.english: Objective To test the irritant effect of Acitazanolast Eye Drops on rabbit eyes.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察阿扎司特滴眼液對兔眼刺激性影響。

sentences.english: It is strong irritative to skin and eyes.
sentences.chinese: 對皮膚及眼睛有強烈的刺激性。

sentences.english: Principle 4 people re ond to incentives.
sentences.chinese: 原則4，人們對刺激性因素的響應。

sentences.english: Like red, it captivates the eye, but can be an irritant if over-used.
sentences.chinese: 喜歡紅色，魅力的眼睛，但如果能有刺激性過度使用。

sentences.english: Choices, should be avoided with a pungent odor of decorative plate.
sentences.chinese: 選擇時，應避免用有刺激性氣味的裝飾板。

sentences.english: Sevoflurane caused less airway irritation than other inhaled anesthetics.
sentences.chinese: 七氟醚對呼吸道的刺激性明顯低於其他吸入麻醉劑。

sentences.english: He has seborrhea, and shouldn't have too much stimulating food.
sentences.chinese: 他有皮脂溢出症，醫生建議他少喫刺激性食物。

sentences.english: Don't eat anything cold or spicy.
sentences.chinese: 不要喫生冷和刺激性食物。

definition: to provoke/to irritate/to upset/to stimulate/to excite/irritant
